website_summaries.verdict: While this brand may be known best for stripping away pores, its cleanser is gentle and manageable.
pros: Foam itself is light and won't leave a color residue
We love that it smooths skin in just 30 seconds
cons: Test on small patches of skin to reduce potential reactions

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is not bad like the reviews say. The package clearly says “use 1-3 times a WEEK” people are using it everyday. That how you break out. YES this product is strong that’s why they say use a limited time a week. But it’s good to clean the face, that’s all. It leaves your pores open for to long. You have to sleep on a fresh pillow case/bedding because tour pores are open. And use a great moisturizer after. Because it DEEp cleans tour face good. If you use it everyday you WILL break out
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Decent cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This does a decent job at cleaning but doesn’t reduce my pores. The only pore reducer I have ever used that works is Dr. Brandt vacuum cleaner/ pore reducer. It’s pricey but I bought five products like this one trying to find one that works and by the time I was done, I’d spent triple what the product that does work costs. Plus a tube of it lasts forever. If you’re specifically looking to reduce the visibility of your pores, don’t waste your money on this product. If you just like the idea of a charcoal cleanser, go for it. I still use it in the shower as a cleanser (since I bought it)
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very agressive even for oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: Agressive for skin, even if you use it just 1 min, time to mass the skin. it is a kind of a scrub which is not precised. Supposedly, it is charcoal, at least the color is. I got an imediate redness and heat on my face: this product gave me a contact dermatitis. I rinsed immediately, but my skin is burning. I send it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: VeroTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: 🖤LOVE IT🖤
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. I’m a makeup wearer and not cleansing my face properly was wreaking havoc on my pores on my cheeks. I layed off the full beats for a while to address the problem. I tried other popular products and they cleaned my skin but didn’t minimize the pores and often dried my skin out. After two applications my pores were minimized drastically. This has now become a permanent part of my skin care!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this once at my local store and I loved it. Sadly they no longer sell it so I went here to buy it. I love the Bioré Charcoal products so I was happy to find in here on Amazon. The smell is great and it gives a tingling feeling while you use it that makes you feel like it's really working. I didn't really see a difference when it came to my pore size, but I still find this product worth using.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on your skin!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I have sensitive skin and even Cetaphil cleanser bars don’t retain my breakouts. This is my favorite facial cleanser, leaves my skin soft, smooth and it’s even starting to lighten up my scars and dark spots! Highly recommend. The company is working on their packaging for now as 2/2 of my orders arrived cracked and leaking, respectively. But they took care of it and it’s such a great product it makes up for it!
customer_reviews.author: Pyae

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and had a reaction to this, pretty bad one, the smells not great but it’s not horrible. Awkward to pump out. Not loving the brand

customer_reviews.title: Arrived w no protective  seal
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a plastic bag and no protective seal. I dare not use it and applied for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin beware
customer_reviews.text: For my skin personally (oily and dry combination) it was a bit too harsh so I switched to Dr. G mild peeling gel. This dries out my skin a lot less.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and have been using it for years. If you use it more than a few times a week it will dry out your skin.

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks pores good

Once I finally received it in the mail, the back of the bottle now says it has salicylic acid. I can't use that ingredient and I'm annoyed that the product page wasn't truthful

My pores do look smaller, but I'd recommend starting slow with this, and seeing how your skin reacts! Admittedly, I have really sensitive skin, so it could just be me, but it can't hurt to start with just one use per week at the beginning!

I have dry skin that is a little sensitive to abrasive exfoliators but this does very well for me. I use it 2-3 times a week to get rid of dead skin. Just be careful to not get to rough when rubbing it on your face if you have skin like mine or it can get a little red. But for the most part it is gentle and effective.

product_meta.title: Bioré Charcoal Pore Minimizing Skin Polisher, 3.11 Ounce, for Large Pore Treatment on Oily Skin with Natural Micro-crystals for Smoother Skin
product_meta.description:
Product Description:

The truth is that clogged pores can magnify their appearance, making them look larger and more noticeable. Luckily for you, Biore Charcoal Pore Minimizer for Oily Skin instantly diminishes the appearance of large pores. With charcoal, known for its abilities to draw out and trap impurities, and natural micro-crystals (fancy for exfoliants), this innovative polisher deep cleans pores and gently sweeps away dead skin cells and debris. When you activate it with water and massage it over your skin for 30 seconds, it smoothes skin and leaves pores visibly smaller in just one use. 

How to Use Biore Charcoal Pore Minimizer: 

Wet hands and face with warm water. Dispense 1 pump into hands and work into a rich lather. Massage gently over face, avoiding eye area, in small circular motions for 30 seconds. Immediately rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry. For optimal results, use 2-3 times weekly.

About Biore Skincare:

Biore Skincare targets the root of all skin problems—the evil clogged pore. So when it comes to dirt and oil we take a no nonsense approach to fight smarter, not harder. Our scrub, liquid, powder, strip, mask and bar cleansing products go straight to the source of those pesky pores for deeply clean, beautiful skin.
feature_bullets: PURIFY YOUR PORES - With natural charcoal, known for it's abilities to draw out and trap impurities, this water-activated cleanser polishes skin and helps remove dirt and oil deep within pores.
VISIBLY SMALLER PORES - Specially formulated to instantly diminish the appearance of pores within 30 seconds of use.
SMOOTHER, POLISHED SKIN - Formulated with natural micro-crystals and helps exfoliate your skin, leading to smoother results.
DEEP CLEANSING AND OIL REMOVAL - The Japanese skin purifying technology of Bioré Charcoal cleansers, scrubs, and polishers are ideal for built-up dirt on oily skin.
DESIGNED FOR CONTINUAL USE - Our charcoal skin polisher is suitable to use up to three times weekly, and intended for exfoliation of the face. Reduce use with first signs of irritation.
